feedback: One of the most convenient wallets that I used. Friendly and simple interface, support for the most popular cryptocurrencies and exchange availability. What else is needed? Thank you for my new favorite app.
It’s indeed extremely user-friendly. Even for me, a common user, this wallet is very easy to manage. And it’s super great that it doesn’t require any personal info and has no access to my funds.
I was using brd wallet and jaxx. When I tried Plark I made sure that it is the best multi currency wallet with really cool design and no lags. Highly recommend.
Very easy to use and has everything you need to use cryptocurrency. Would be great to add more coins.
Probably the most convenient app I’ve ever used for crypto.
